title: County central committee elections: tie votes.
subject: Countycentralcommitteeelections
tievotes

abstracts.abstract:
Under existing law, if a tie vote occurs in an election for member of a county central committee, and if the office is to be voted for wholly within one county, the election board shall summon the candidates who received tie votes to appear before the board, and the board shall determine the tie by lot.

This bill would make a nonsubstantive change to the above provision.

actions.description: Introduced. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 15671 of the Elections Code, relating to elections.
